日本人旅行者2人がケニアでマラリアに感染
地震予測検証 / 防災情報 ハザードラボ
国立感染症研究所は29日、5月末から6月にかけてアフリカのケニアに渡航した日本人8人のグループのうち2人が熱帯熱マラリアに感染したと発表した。 この8人のグループ（小学生2人を含む）は、今年5月30日から6月6日までの日程で、ケニア各地を訪れていたが、感染した2 ...

alerts.summary: PRO/EDR> Malaria - Kenya: new Anopheles mosquito
alerts.descr:
Scientists have discovered what could be a new breed of mosquito in Africa with the potential to cause hundreds of thousands more deaths from malaria. Charities say the previously unknown mosquito could pose a serious setback to the global fight against the disease, one of the world's biggest killers.

Researchers said the discovery is worrying because the insect does not behave like normal mosquitoes. Already, nearly one million people a year die from malaria caused by bites from

alerts.summary: PRO> Malaria, artemisinin resistance - East Africa
alerts.descr: A strain of the malaria parasite _Plasmodium falciparum_ that is resistant to artemisinin, one of the most powerful anti-malarial drugs, has been found in East Africa. The strain tested positive in blood samples from foreigners who had travelled in Kenya and Tanzania and 9 other African countries. This particular strain had been found at the border of Thailand and Myanmar and had been predicted to be spreading to India and then Africa as resistance to other antimalarial drugs has done

深圳输入性疟疾病例上升 计划2017年消除此病
搜狐
通过控制，自1997年起，深圳疟疾发病率一直控制在1/万以下，未再出现疟疾疫情的区域或局部暴发，达到国家控制和基本消除疟疾的水平。 据了解，2011年深圳经旅行社组织前往非洲如南非、埃及、肯尼亚等国家旅游 ...
